an10.47:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an10.47:1.2: Atha kho mahali licchavi yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahali licchavi bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.47:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo papassa kammassa kiriyaya papassa kammassa pavattiya”ti?
an10.47:1.4: “Lobho kho, mahali, hetu, lobho paccayo papassa kammassa kiriyaya papassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:1.5: Doso kho, mahali, hetu, doso paccayo papassa kammassa kiriyaya papassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:1.6: Moho kho, mahali, hetu, moho paccayo papassa kammassa kiriyaya papassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:1.7: Ayoniso manasikaro kho, mahali, hetu, ayoniso manasikaro paccayo papassa kammassa kiriyaya papassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:1.8: Micchapanihitam kho, mahali, cittam hetu, micchapanihitam cittam paccayo papassa kammassa kiriyaya papassa kammassa pavattiyati.
an10.47:1.9: Ayam kho, mahali, hetu, ayam paccayo papassa kammassa kiriyaya papassa kammassa pavattiya”ti.
an10.47:2.1: “Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo kalyanassa kammassa kiriyaya kalyanassa kammassa pavattiya”ti?
an10.47:2.2: “Alobho kho, mahali, hetu, alobho paccayo kalyanassa kammassa kiriyaya kalyanassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:2.3: Adoso kho, mahali, hetu, adoso paccayo kalyanassa kammassa kiriyaya kalyanassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:2.4: Amoho kho, mahali, hetu, amoho paccayo kalyanassa kammassa kiriyaya kalyanassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:2.5: Yoniso manasikaro kho, mahali, hetu, yoniso manasikaro paccayo kalyanassa kammassa kiriyaya kalyanassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:2.6: Sammapanihitam kho, mahali, cittam hetu, sammapanihitam cittam paccayo kalyanassa kammassa kiriyaya kalyanassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:2.7: Ayam kho, mahali, hetu, ayam paccayo kalyanassa kammassa kiriyaya kalyanassa kammassa pavattiya.
an10.47:2.8: Ime ca, mahali, dasa dhamma loke na samvijjeyyum, nayidha pannayetha adhammacariyavisamacariyati va dhammacariyasamacariyati va.
an10.47:2.9: Yasma ca kho, mahali, ime dasa dhamma loke samvijjanti, tasma pannayati adhammacariyavisamacariyati va dhammacariyasamacariyati va”ti.
